article_title: Jamie Whyte: Political Virtue as a Fashion Accessory
article_text:
Adults should put on their own oxygen masks before helping children with theirs. That's what they tell you on the airplane safety videos as you taxi out for take-off.

If something went wrong in-flight and oxygen masks dropped from the overhead lockers, a parent might naturally look after her child first. But that may well result in both the adult and the child passing out and dying. Better for the adult to sort herself out first and...

twitter.description: New Zealand's ACT Party leader Jamie Whyte writes in The Wall Street Journal Europe that to many voters and politicians, increasing greenhouse-gas emissions is a price worth paying to show that they want to reduce emissions.
twitter.title: Political Virtue as a Fashion Accessory

image.alt: Moral preening, not reducing emissions, is the goal of Green policy

article_summary:
If something went wrong in-flight and oxygen masks dropped from the overhead lockers, a parent might naturally look after her child first.
Adults should put on their own oxygen masks before helping children with theirs.
That's what they tell you on the airplane safety videos as you taxi out for take-off.
But that may well result in both the adult and the child passing out and dying.
Better for the adult to sort herself out first and...
